verses.name: Psalms 139:8
verses.text: If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.

verses.name: Psalms 139:9
verses.text: If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea;

verses.name: Psalms 139:10
verses.text: Even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.

verses.name: Psalms 139:11
verses.text: If I say, Surely the darkness shall cover me; even the night shall be light about me.

verses.name: Psalms 139:12
verses.text: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.
